data.eml:eml: Xantholinus dvoraki Coiffait, 1956, the only valid species of the subgenus Meneidophallus Bordoni, 1999, with remarkably variable internal sac of aedeagus (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gusarov, Vladimir I. (2002): Xantholinus dvoraki Coiffait, 1956, the only valid species of the subgenus Meneidophallus Bordoni, 1999, with remarkably variable internal sac of aedeagus (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae). Zootaxa 21: 1-11, DOI: 10.5072/zenodo.155578
